name: Confederation of European Waste-to-Energy Plants
legal: Non-profitmaking organisation, registered as e.V. in Germany
goal:
CEWEP is the umbrella association of the Waste-to-Energy plants across Europe.

CEWEP's aim is to represent the interests of the Waste-to-Energy sector at the European level.

This includes gathering information on up-coming legislation in order to keep our members up to date on issues relating to waste management, renewable energy and environmental protection as well as informing the European institutions about the Waste-to-Energy sector and its contribution to achieving sustainable waste management.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Best Available Techniques Reference Document (BREFs)
Taxonomy (Sustainable Finance)
Implementation of the Circular Economy Package
Implementation of the Energy Union Package
